author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the failure reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49295#issuecomment-3678542014. The second commit also addresses my comment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49295/files#r2539816367.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1743

#### PR validation:

Workflow 160.401 succeeds
title: Fix InputTag of `particleFlowClusterHBHE`
